articles.author: Anna Nicolaou, Patrick Temple-West, James Fontanella-Khan
articles.title: Jamie Dimon backs Disney's Bob Iger in proxy fight with Nelson Peltz - Financial Times
articles.description: JPMorgan boss praises ‘outstanding leader’ as bank advises media group on battle with activist
articles.content: JPMorgan Chase chief executive Jamie Dimon has endorsed Disneys Bob Iger as a proxy battle with billionaire activist Nelson Peltz nears a showdown at the entertainment giants annual meeting next mont… [+3492 chars]
